import React from "react"; // import { InputText, InputFile } from "elements/Form"; import InputFile from "elements/Form/InputFile"; import InputText from "elements/Form/InputText"; import logoBCA from "assets/images/logo-bca.jpg"; import logoMandiri from "assets/images/logo-mandiri.jpg"; export default function Payment(props) { const { data, ItemDetails, checkout } = props; const tax = 10; const subTotal = ItemDetails.price * checkout.duration; const grandTotal = (subTotal * tax) / 100 + subTotal; return (

Transfer Pembayaran:

Tax: {tax}%

Sub Total: ${subTotal} USD

Total: {grandTotal} USD

Bank Central Asia
1301 1999
Gilang Ramadhan Hatno
Bank Mandiri
